typography.colors: The design uses a dark theme with shades of gray for the background and white for text. Accent colors like blue and green are used for highlights and interactive elements.
typography.typography: Sans-serif fonts are used for readability, with varying font weights to establish hierarchy.
typography.spacing: Consistent padding and margins are used to separate components, ensuring a clean and organized appearance.
typography.visual_hierarchy: The use of color and typography effectively guides the user's attention to important elements like buttons and active states.

structure.overall_layout: The design uses a two-column layout with a sidebar on the left and a main content area on the right. The sidebar contains navigation elements, while the main content area is divided into multiple sections using cards.
structure.grid_system: The layout appears to use a flexible grid system, likely based on CSS flexbox, to accommodate various screen sizes.
structure.component_hierarchy: The hierarchy is clear with a top navbar, a left sidebar for navigation, and a main content area with cards for detailed information.

typography.colors: The design uses a dark theme with shades of gray for the background and white for text. Accent colors like blue and green are used for highlights and interactive elements.
typography.typography: Sans-serif fonts are used for readability, with varying font weights to establish hierarchy.

accessibility_notes.A11y_considerations: Ensure sufficient color contrast for text readability, provide keyboard navigation support, and use ARIA labels for interactive elements.
accessibility_notes.improvements: Add focus indicators for keyboard navigation and ensure all interactive elements are accessible via screen readers.

prompt_for_platform: Implement a dark-themed dashboard using V0 (Vercel) with a two-column layout. Use a sidebar for navigation and a main content area with cards. Utilize flexbox for responsive design. Ensure all buttons and inputs are accessible and provide hover states. Use CSS variables for theme management and ensure all text meets WCAG color contrast standards.
uncertain_flags: Specific hover effects for interactive elements
